content: The next day they meet, and in dialog with Jon, Damien is starting to realize that most of his life has been spent in pride and making it all about himself. That there are ways he has been hurt by his own family (use examples from stories in the comics) and then he has acted out in return. He wishes that this cycle would stop with him, and also beginning to realize that everyone is dealing with their own past, even his actual father (Bruce Wayne/Batman) and that even adults have sin they need to repent of and suffering they need help with. Jon encourage him to pray for them and pray God would use his changing life and their friendship in Christ as a witness to others. He invites him to attend church services with him and get connected to his friends in youth group.
